item.title: [BON-MARCHE] Cults3d > sneakygitz > 10mm_Chaos_Dwarf_Earthshaker_Cannon [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/10mm-chaos-dwarf-earthshaker-cannon

Id objet : 10mm-chaos-dwarf-earthshaker-cannon

Prix : 0.64 euros

Collections :

  • warmaster NAINS-DU-CHAOS

Collections pour tags :

  • warmaster NAINS-DU-CHAOS NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1

This was designed to proxy for Earthshaker cannons in 10mm Wargames. The physical print pictures show the Earthshaker alongside a GW dwarf flame cannon and WM base to show you how it compares in size. The render also shows you a crew member to give you a sense of its size. There are no crew in this file, just the cannon. Wheels will need to be printed four times and should be printed at 46% scale to fit the Cannon.

item.title: [BON-MARCHE] Cults3d > sneakygitz > 10mm_Chaos_Dwarf_Hellcannon [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/10mm-chaos-dwarf-hellcannon

Id objet : 10mm-chaos-dwarf-hellcannon

Prix : 0.65 euros

Collections :

  • warmaster NAINS-DU-CHAOS

Collections pour tags :

  • warmaster NAINS-DU-CHAOS NONDL SUP

Description :

1

Unsupported and presupported 10mm Hell cannon (no crew) for 100mm Wargames with chaos armies. Take extra special care when removing the supports from features like chains, levers and guages. I've included pictures of the printed Cannon alongside some WM undead to give you a sense of the scale.

Justification du tag SUP :

Unsupported and presupported 10mm Hell cannon (no crew) for 100mm Wargames with chaos armies. Take extra special care when removing the supports from features like chains, levers and guages. I’ve included pictures of the printed Cannon alongside some WM undead to give you a sense of the scale.
